embed.description: Click here to signup and play League of Legends: http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=en_us_ytub_pp006 Welcome to episode 6 of the Patch Preview! In store for this patch, we have nerfs and buffs alike. This preview talk about Renekton as a tanky DPS re-balance case, mitigating some of the split-pushing annoyance, and item changes that should help with a lot of other issues.

replies.body: Both of these bring me back to a different place in time. Wow...

rip free t-shirts?? =c

when did that stop. lol
Rip Heart of Gold :( never forget

I shed a single, manly tear when HoG got mentioned. RIP in peace.

Also, that audio recording though. Echoes for days.

Dear god is this what League looked like back then?

They came a long way.
Morello just needs to change his name to fedora tipper.
Oh god, Teemo buying Wriggle's a lot...I remember when this came out. Mang, this is old.
Today: "Yea, we're today pretty much the EXACT opposite. Well, ok - we keep nerfing Teemo'cause he's satan."
